concept.title: Changing the log rotation settings
concept.shortdesc: You can change the log rotation settings by using the imaserver update LogConfig command on the command line. The log rotation settings determine the maximum size that a log file reaches before it is archived. The log rotation settings also determine how many log files are archived before the oldest log file is deleted from the server.

conbody.p:
You can change the log rotation settings of the following log files:
-default.log
-connection.log
-security.log
-admin.log
-mqconnectivity.log That is, you can change the log rotation settings of all the files that are displayed by a show log list command, except for the webui-messages.log file.
You can set the maximum size that a log file reaches before it is archived. You can set how many log files are archived before the oldest log file is deleted.
